metadata.name: Alt Horsemen (+Pestilence)
metadata.description:
This mod adds a completely new set of harbingers for the alternate path! Also comes with a unique (stronger) cube of meat variant.
Requires [b]Custom Stage API[/b] get it -> [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1348031964]here[/url]
-----------------------------------------
[h1]Harbinger Hitlist[/h1] [list] [*]Famine (Downpour/Dross) ✓ [*]War (Mines/Ashpit) ✓ [*]Death (Mausoleum/Gehenna) ✓ [*]Pestilence (Corpse) ✓
[*]Conquest (?) [*]Headless Horseman (?) [/list]
When the horsemen get added into the alt path officially, this mod will cease to exist forever (not really)
-----------------------------------------
[h1]Credits[/h1] [url=https://twitter.com/hippotasty]hippocrunchy[/url] - Design, Sprites, Implementation
[url=https://twitter.com/lambchop_is_ok]lambchop_is_ok[/url] - Sprites (Famine) [url=https://twitter.com/TotallyNotIlias]TotallyNotIlias[/url] - Sprites (War) [url=https://twitter.com/Cometz202]Cometz[/url] - Sprites (Pestilence, boss portraits)
[url=https://twitter.com/_jubbalub]jubbalub[/url] - Tumor Item Concept [url=https://twitter.com/NY_Sagittarius]NotYourSagittarius[/url] - Original Character Design
